subject: Wimbledon Tennis Tournament
Tennis
lead_paragraph: After Sloane Stephens rallied past Monica Puig in the fourth round, she became the player to beat at Wimbledon, at least according to Serena Williams.
snippet: After Sloane Stephens rallied past Monica Puig in the fourth round, she became the player to beat at Wimbledon, at least according to Serena Williams.
